description: The Brightech SmartPlay Bluetooth 30 Pin Audio Receiver simply plugs into any ordinary Iphone/Ipod docking station and turns it into a wireless bluetooth docking station. With the SmartPlay receiver you can change tracks and control the music on your docking station wireless without having to constantly go up to the speakers.
title: BrightPlay 30 Pin Bluetooth Audio Receiver/ Adapter for iPhones and iPods
